info.label: Knowledge Lens: A Rockwell Automation Company

summaryCardDetails.summary:
Dedicated and results-driven technology professional has over 5+ years of expertise and a proven track record in big data engineering, seeking a challenging role to leverage expertise in ETL processes, cloud architecture, and data analytics. Striving to contribute innovative solutions to optimize data workflows, drive efficiency, and deliver impactful results for an industry-leading organization.

Led data engineering projects for top pharmaceutical firms, enhancing data processing efficiency and analytics workflows. Partnered with industry leaders to develop secure ETL processes for healthcare data and improved data-driven decision-making with innovative big data solutions.
